# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ANALYZE_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(ANALYZE)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ANALYZEPluginInfo.C
ANALYZECommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
ANALYZEPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ANALYZEMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtANALYZEFileFormat.C
DSRObject.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ANALYZEEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtANALYZEFileFormat.C
DSRObject.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IANALYZEDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IANALYZEDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IANALYZEDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MANALYZEDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MANALYZEDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MANALYZEDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MANALYZEDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EANALYZEDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EANALYZEDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EANALYZEDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EANALYZEDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EANALYZEDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EANALYZEDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EANALYZEDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EANALYZEDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases ANALYZE ${INSTALLTARGETS})
